## newBinding() function

Create a new keybinding with optional configuration.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function newBinding(options?: BindingOptions): Binding;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

options


</td><td>

[BindingOptions](./key.bindingoptions.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

[Binding](./key.binding.md)

## Example


```ts
const up = newBinding({
  keys: ["k", "up"],
  help: { key: "↑/k", desc: "move up" },
});

// Or fluent style:
const down = newBinding()
  .withKeys("j", "down")
  .withHelp("↓/j", "move down");
```
